i am doing research on Minamoto Yoshitsune but have been unable or 
overlooked information detailing what number son he is. Eg - is he the 
youngest son, Yoshitomo's fourth???
Also - i know that Yoritomo at the age of 13 fought with Yoshitomo in the 
insurrection/disturbance - but did Yoshitomo have any elder sons who also 
fought???
